locations.clue_value: A detailed sketch of a famous painting.
locations.name: Kunsthistorisches Museum
locations.npc_dialogue: I saw someone sketching the paintings, but they left in a hurry.

locations.clue_value: A description of a unique hat.
locations.name: Naschmarkt
locations.npc_dialogue: The aroma of fresh pastries was intoxicating, but I noticed a figure with a peculiar hat.

locations.name: Belvedere Palace
locations.npc_dialogue: I overheard a conversation about a rare painting being sold.

locations.name: Fisherman's Bastion
locations.npc_dialogue: A woman with striking red hair was admiring the view, but she seemed distracted.

locations.name: Heroes' Square
locations.npc_dialogue: I saw a man sketching the statues, he seemed too focused on his work.

locations.name: Central Market Hall
locations.npc_dialogue: There was a commotion about a stolen item, but it was all hushed up quickly.

locations.clue_value: A man in a dark coat.
locations.name: Charles Bridge
locations.npc_dialogue: A man in a dark coat was acting suspiciously near the statues.

locations.name: Old Town Square
locations.npc_dialogue: I overheard someone talking about a secret auction.

locations.clue_value: Rumor of a thief among tourists.
locations.name: Prague Castle
locations.npc_dialogue: There was a rumor of a thief hiding among the tourists.

description: In the heart of Vienna, a series of art thefts has left the city in turmoil. As whispers of a notorious art thief circulate, you must navigate through the city's rich history and vibrant culture to uncover the truth. Each suspect holds a piece of the puzzle, but only one is the mastermind behind the heists. Can you connect the dots before the thief vanishes into the shadows?

reasoning_chain: Identify the suspect traits from the clues.
Match the traits to the suspects in the database.
Elena is the only suspect with red hair and a hobby of sketching.
Other suspects have conflicting traits or motives.
Confirm the geographical plausibility of the final city.

solution: Connect the clues about the sketching habits, the unique hat, and the red-haired woman to identify Elena as the mastermind behind the art thefts.

suspect_database.background: An art student with a passion for classical paintings.
suspect_database.motive: Desire to fund her studies through art theft.
suspect_database.name: Elena Novak

suspect_database.background: A photographer who often captures art events.
suspect_database.motive: To gain fame through controversial art pieces.
suspect_database.name: Marek Kral

suspect_database.background: A collector of rare art pieces.
suspect_database.motive: To complete his collection at any cost.
suspect_database.name: Tomasz Wozniak

suspect_database.background: A chef with a love for art.
suspect_database.motive: To create a culinary art exhibit.
suspect_database.name: Sofia Petrov

title: Shadows of the Past
